content.raw:
@iche033, I'm not sure what's happening. When I reviewed [this](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_web_app/pull-request/9/fix-gzweb-installation-instructions/diff), `. /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh` worked, but now I'm trying to do a fresh Gzweb install and I get this:

~~~
$ . /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh
bash: /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh: No such file or directory
~~~

Now I can only find `. /usr/local/share/gazebo/setup.sh`
content.html:
@iche033, I'm not sure what's happening. When I reviewed this, . /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh worked, but now I'm trying to do a fresh Gzweb install and I get this:

$ . /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh
bash: /usr/share/gazebo/setup.sh: No such file or directory

Now I can only find . /usr/local/share/gazebo/setup.sh
